backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Nebacrypt backend, managing project submissions, user profiles, access control, blob storage, and email notifications with Norwegian-language authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single high-confidence UI fix: applying a darker text color class to a specific paragraph in LandingPage.tsx to meet contrast/legibility requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles, recent changes, and key features across the React application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Nebacrypt frontend with Norwegian language attribute, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, and a vector favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing (including an 'icp-info' route), authentication state, profile setup modal display, and wrapping the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the Nebacrypt logo, copyright bar with caffeine.ai attribution, and contact details (org number, company name, and Oslo address) in a mobile-responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with desktop and mobile menus, Internet Identity login/logout, admin dashboard link for admins, and an 'Internet Computer' nav item pointing to the icp-info page.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay that fades in, showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...'.
frontend/src/components/MusicTrackCard.t: A card component that renders a clickable link to a Suno music track, with a helper function that parses a human-readable title from the Suno URL.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects name, email, and optional company from a new user and creates their profile via the useCreateUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details and budget, submits the project via useSubmitProject, and shows a success screen or login option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state (login, logout, identity persistence) via the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile CRUD, project submission, and message queries, using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens (background, foreground, accent, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all project submissions in a table, allows status management (reviewed, followup, in-progress, completed), messaging, and delivery link attachment. Includes admin-only access guard using `useIsCallerAdmin`.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client-facing portal where authenticated users (via Internet Identity) can submit projects, view their project statuses with badges, and exchange messages with admins. Also exposes a public submission form for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/pages/ICPInfoPage.tsx: Informational page (in Norwegian) explaining Internet Computer Protocol technology, covering key pillars like canisters, subnets, chain-key cryptography, NNS governance, and use cases such as DeFi, NFTs, and social media.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page featuring a hero section with logo, navigation buttons to the client portal and music page, an ICP teaser section, and smooth-scroll support for services and contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music showcase page listing tracks by 'Synthetic Agondonters' as cards with Suno links, a hero image, and a descriptive section about the artist concept with a link to the Suno profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via oklch, border radius, fonts, animations) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking version, existing features, and known issues; currently records a fix request to darken text contrast in the landing page ICP teaser section.
